properties.name: photoshopPathNames
properties.description: A list of the clipping paths stored in the graphic.

properties.name: alphaChannelPathNames
properties.description: A list of the alpha channels stored in the graphic.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the ClippingPathSettings (a Image, EPS, WMF, PICT, PDF or ImportedPage).

properties.name: invertPath
properties.description: If true, inverts the clipping path.

properties.name: includeInsideEdges
properties.description: If true, creates interior clipping paths within the surrounding clipping path. Note: Valid only when clipping type is alpha channel or detect edges.

properties.name: restrictToFrame
properties.description: If true, truncates the clipping path at the edge of the frame containing the graphic. Note: Valid only when clipping type is alpha channel or detect edges.

properties.name: useHighResolutionImage
properties.description: If true, uses the high-resolution version of the graphic to create the clipping path. If false, calculates the clipping path based on screen-display resolution. Note: Valid only when clipping type is detect edges.

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: The lowest value (darkest) pixel to allow in the image. All pixels in the image whose values are greater than (lighter than) the threshold value are clipped (obscured). (Range: 0 to 255) Note: Valid only when clipping type is detect edges or alpha channel.

properties.name: tolerance
properties.description: Specifies how similar a pixel's intensity value can be to the threshold value before the pixel is obscured by the clipping path. (Range: 0 to 10) Note: Valid only when clipping type is detect edges or alpha channel.

properties.name: insetFrame
properties.description: Shrinks the area enclosed by the clipping path by the specified amount. (Range depends on the unit. For points: -10000 to 10000; picas: -833p4 to 833p4; inches: -138.8889 to 138.8889; mm: -3527.778 to 3527.778; cm: -352.7778 to 352.7778; ciceros: -781c11.889 to 781c11.889)

properties.name: appliedPathName
properties.description: The name of the Photoshop path or alpha channel to use as a clipping path.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: convertToFrame
methods.description: Converts the clipping path to a frame.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ClippingPathSettings.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
